com.microsoft.windowsazure.mobileservices

Class MobileServiceClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.mobileservices.MobileServiceClient

  • public class MobileServiceClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Entry point for Microsoft Azure Mobile app interactions

      • onActivityResult

        public MobileServiceActivityResult onActivityResult(android.content.Intent data)
        Helper method which can be used in the onActivityResult() of your activity that started the server-direct login flow, to retrieve the MobileServiceActivityResult which contains the login status and the error message from the login.
        Parameters:
        data - The Intent that returns the login result back to the caller
        Returns:
        authenticated Mobile Service user

        oAuthToken - A Json object representing the oAuth token used for authentication
        parameters - Additional parameters for the authentication process
        callback - Callback to invoke when the authentication process finishes
